body_html: @PenghuiCheng, I wanted to verify that this works for my training use case, but before I can do that we need to upgrade MKL-DNN in Caffe2 and patch some of the other PRs (e.g. for collective communication). Is anyone else blocked on support for these ops?
body_text: @PenghuiCheng, I wanted to verify that this works for my training use case, but before I can do that we need to upgrade MKL-DNN in Caffe2 and patch some of the other PRs (e.g. for collective communication). Is anyone else blocked on support for these ops?
body: @PenghuiCheng, I wanted to verify that this works for my training use case, but before I can do that we need to upgrade MKL-DNN in Caffe2 and patch some of the other PRs (e.g. for collective communication). Is anyone else blocked on support for these ops?
